transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Good morning, sir.
Executive: Hello. Anshika baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se baat IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji. Sir ye main sir aapki na main kal call matlab call aayi thi kal aur jisne onboarding person ko jisne aapko ye services di hai unko call ki thi aapne?
Customer: Kis ko Sumit ko?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: To unhone uthai?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji. To koi problem hai na abhi aapko kis regarding aapne unko call ki thi actually abhi na main hi aapka jo ye account hai main hi handle karungi main hi account manager hu. To aap na main aapko apna number de dungi whatsapp pe aapko high likh ke bhej dungi aapko koi bhi issue hota hai to aap mujhe call kariyega, theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan. But kal aapne unko kyu call ki thi matlab kis regarding call ki thi koi issue hai aapko?
Customer: Live karane ke liye kiya tha unhone bola tha ki main live karaunga. Ho nahi raha tha kya problem hai bataiye mujhe main isliye phone kiya tha.
Executive: Achcha achcha. To wo na main live hone mein ek do din aur lag jana hai kyuki jab live hota hai na mere paas hi welcome call aayegi aapki. Sorry main itni der se aapko disturb kar rahi thi. Na to jab ye live ho jayega aapne dekha hai usko?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan wo dekha hai fir na aapki welcome call hoti hai. Hai na? Wo welcome call main jab aayegi mere paas to main aapki welcome call lungi jisme main aapko sab kuch samjhaungi kaise aapko services use karni hai kis tarah aapko buylead consume karni hai buylead abhi ek do consume kiye?
Customer: Suno, suno mujhe wo kal Sumit ne samjhaya hai ki lead by lead jo aati hai wo aapko consume karni hai. Usme se maine 10 aayi thi mere paas. 10 me se maine chhe abhi matlab wo diya hai maine jo quotation dete hain.
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Abhi kisi ka mere paas call aaya nahi.
Executive: Kitni consume kar li aapne buylead abhi tak?
Customer: Abhi to maine char bachi hui hai 10 me se.
Executive: 10 me se char bachi hui hai. Theek hai. Chhe consume kar chuke ho aap. To aapne buylead consume karne ke baad buyer se baat ki?
Customer: Abhi to ki nahi hai.
Executive: Haan wahi main aapko bataungi ki jaise aap buylead to consume karoge wo to aapko pata chal gaya hoga lekin aap buyer se kaise baat karoge kahan se aapko number milega kis tarah aap unse contact karoge wo sari cheez aapko welcome call me sikhai jayegi. Right? To wo pura services hai ek ek uske kya features hai kya features hai wo sab welcome call me sikhai jayegi. Ye maine is regarding aapko call kiya hai aapne kal unko call ki hogi na to yahan pe na hamare yahan ek miss inka concern confirm base ho jata hai. Agar wo pick up nahi karte hain. Theek hai? To wo baat karke agar aapko koi issue hota hai to wo solve karke hi hame concern close karna hota hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Haan to isliye maine aapko call ki thi abhi maine aapko bataya ki aapki services live ho gayi hai abhi welcome call kal maybe kal aapki welcome call aa jaye main aapko samne se call karungi aapko sari services samjhane ke baad video meet ke through. Video meet ke through ye pura connect honge hum. Theek hai?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji. Theek hai, theek hai.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji. To abhi agar aapko koi issue nahi ho to main is concern ko close kar du main?
Customer: Haan abhi to koi issue hai nahi.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. To mere regarding ek feedback aapko aayega to please usko positive feedback dijiyega baki main aapko samne se call karungi aur main aapko whatsapp pe hi kar rahi hu aap mera wo number save kar lijiyega Anshika name hai main hi account manager hu aapki, okay?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan baki main aapko ye aur bata deti hu ki jitna aapne buylead consume kiye hai na buylead wale tab se upar aapko ek lead manager wali tab dikh rahi hongi wahan pe. Lead manager pe jaake wahan se aap jaise aapne buylead wale laptop se aap use kar rahe ho ya phone se?
Customer: Phone se, phone se.
Executive: Phone se use kar rahe ho. Theek hai jaise aapne koi buylead consume kiye ab aap unse baat baat to aapko karni hai aapne kari wo to fir bhi main aapko abhi bata deti hu ek do cheez ki wahan pe phone se wo three lining aati hai na three line aati hai side mein. Hai na jab aap wahan pe jaoge ek hoga wahan pe lead manager karke ek hota hai buylead ek hota hai storage manage ek hota hai wahan pe lead manager karke aap lead manager mein jana wahan se aapko buyer ki details milegi jin jin ki aapne buylead consume ki hai. Wahan se aap unka number lo unko call karo ya message karo. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan wahan se unki detail milegi aapko. Hai na aur baki jo details mein main aapko sab samjhaungi jab welcome call aayegi main khud se aapko samne se call karungi. Okay main?
Customer: Ji, theek hai.
Executive: Haan beech mein koi bhi aapko issue hota hai aap mujhe contact kar lijiyega samne se hi. Main abhi aapko apne number se high likh ke bhejti hu whatsapp pe okay?
Customer: Ji, theek hai. Koi nahi aap mujhe thoda chat kar lena.
Executive: Okay mam, okay thank you mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed help with making profile live.

- Customer has not received calls after consuming buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive informed the customer about welcome call.

- Executive explained how to contact buyers.

- Executive offered direct contact for future issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a 'Hi' on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, welcome call, account management, live profile
